latestVersion.citationRequirements:
If using this data set, please the both DNV and the paper (Sólymos, P., Farkas, F., Kemencei, K., Páll-Gergely, B., Vilisics, F., Nagy, A., Kisfali, M.
& Hornung, E. (in press) Micro-habitat scale survey of land snails in dolines of the Alsó-hegy, Aggtelek National Park, Hungary. Mollusca).

fields.value: Complete data set of land snails from the Dolina 2007 project collected by time restricted search

dsDescriptionValue.value: In the “Dolina 2007” project, we sampled four different micro-habitat types (litter, live wood, dead wood, rock) and registered life stages of the collected snail individuals as live (adults or juveniles), fresh empty shells, and broken/degraded shells. This micro-habitat scale surveying of land snails poses new kids of methodological challenges because of different shell accumulation rates in different micro-habitats. Because, we are not aware of any other similar micro-scale malaco-faunistic publication of similar geographical extent, thus we feel our data worth publishing to set up a standard for micro-scale land snail surveys.

publicationCitation.value: Sólymos, P., Farkas, F., Kemencei, K., Páll-Gergely, B., Vilisics, F., Nagy, A., Kisfali, M. & Hornung, E. (in press) Micro-habitat scale survey of land snails in dolines of the Alsó-hegy, Aggtelek National Park, Hungary. Mollusca

fields.value: time restricted direct search in 1 m radius circle for 5 minutes duration
